name: Faheem Ur Rehman
content: The 5th International Conference on Multiphase Flow and Heat Transfer (ICMFHT'20) aims to become the leading annual conference in fields related to Multiphase Flow and Heat Transfer. Topics for ICMFHTâ€™20 include, but are not limited, to the following: Boiling and Condensation Fundamentals and Processes Cavitation CFD Experimental Measurements Flow and Heat Transfer in Porous Media Multiphase Flow and Heat Transfer in Micro and Nano Channels
